name: Simple SQL Server Express Replicator
short_description:
Microsoft SQL Server 2005/2008 Standard/Enterprise can sharing data between databases in different locations. For sharing data servers have diffrent tasks like Publisher, Distributor and Subscriber.
But the problem is SQL Server Express 2005/2008 only receiving data, can not sending. SQL Server Express has only Subscriber task.
The aim of this project is to create simple solution to sharing data between "SQL Server Express" servers.
